UsageÂ¶

To use the XBRL Taxonomy Validator, follow these steps:

  1. Run the Application: Open your terminal or command prompt and navigate to the project directory.

  2. Execute the Script: Run the app.py script with the appropriate arguments:

    python app.py [provider] [path/to/package.zip]

    Replace [provider] with the taxonomy package provider abbreviation (e.g., EDINET) and [path/to/package.zip] with the path to the XBRL taxonomy package ZIP file.

  3. View Results: The application will analyze and fix the taxonomy package as needed. View the output in the terminal to see the results.

XBRL Taxonomy Package Conformant Processor
